channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattresses, cupboards and fridge in the entrance of St Vincent House for a month and getting worse, 28th November
item.description:
Mattresses, cupboards and fridge in the entrance of St Vincent House for a month and getting worse. You have closed the ticket 5 times already marking it as fixed without any action having been taken. Please take action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fendall Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leak in road. Many cracks. Near bus stop and pedestrian crossing., 28th November
item.description:
This leak has been happening for around 2 weeks but has not been obvious due to heavy rain. However, on dry days it is clearly not rainwater but water from below ground.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenscroft Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping black bags and baby furniture Daneville Road, 28th November
item.description:
Flytipping black bags, baby furniture and household items Daneville Road. Could this please be investigated waste management as this pick up point for the houses opposite (3A-11) is not appropriate and has become a constant dumping ground for flytipping. They should have their own bins and collection point on their side of the street. Meanwhile could the flytipping please be collected. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Daneville Road, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Heavy metal canister abandoned on small tree pit, 28th November
item.description:
Near 201 Graham Road on the north side a 'laughing gas' canister has been dropped on by a small tree. This seems to be an area for this kind of dumping, as I've reported before recently.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Graham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
